verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious precious blood of Jesus Ever flowing free Oh believe it oh receive it Tis for thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious precious blood of Jesus Shed on Calvary Shed for rebels shed for sinners Shed for thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious precious blood of Jesus Let it make thee whole Let it flow in mighty cleansing O'er thy soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though thy sins are red like crimson Deep in scarlet glow Jesus' precious blood shall wash thee White as snow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious blood that hath redeemed us All the price is paid Perfect pardon now is offered peace is made{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now the holiest with boldness We may enter in For the open fountain cleanseth From all sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious blood by this we conquer In the fiercest fight Sin and Satan overcoming By its might{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious blood whose full atonement Makes us nigh to God Precious blood our way of glory Praise and laud{/lang-eng}
